qas.question: What was the main subject of controversy that arose within the Reformed Church during the beginning of the Republic?
The controversy surrounding the subject of predestination is known as what?

answers.text: the struggle between Arminianism and Gomarism, or between Remonstrants and Contra-Remonstrants

qas.question: What led to the banning of the Remonstrant faith in 1618?

plausible_answers.text: In the first years of the Republic

qas.question: When was there controversy within the Synod of Dort?
Where did controversy appear around banning of the Remonstrat faith?
What group lead to the banning of the subject of predestination?

plausible_answers.text: the struggle between Arminianism and Gomarism, or between Remonstrants and Contra-Remonstrants.

qas.question: What did disagreement about the Synod of Dort become known as?
In 1618 How did the Reformed Church help solve the controversy?

context: <b3_0> Trong những năm đầu của Cộng hòa <b3_0/> , tranh cãi nảy sinh <b4_0> trong Giáo hội Cải cách <b4_0/> , chủ yếu xoay quanh chủ đề <a0_0> tiền định trước <a0_0/> . Điều này đã trở thành được gọi là <a1_0><b6_0> cuộc đấu tranh giữa Arminianism và Gomarism, hoặc giữa Remonstrants và Contra-Remonstrants <a1_0/> . <b6_0/> Năm 1618 <a2_0><b5_0> Synod of Dort <b5_0/><a2_0/> giải quyết vấn đề này, dẫn đến <b7_0> cấm của đức tin Remonstrant <b7_0/> .
